sentence: "David Bossie is so craven and maniacal that in the heyday of the overreaching Gingrich-era Congress the top Whitewater conspiracy theorist in the House had to fire him for doctoring evidence
He has devoted his career ever since to trying to tear down Hillary Clinton
For months now Citizens United has been acting as an arm of the Trump campaign and this hiring of Bossie now makes it official
This is just the latest sign that Donald Trump has put the most extreme elements of the right-wing fringe in the drivers seat of his campaign."
